Category.Name: Root
Category.Description: Provides the Root of the GenICam features tree.

Category.Name: ChunkData
Category.Description: This category includes items related to the chunk data that can be appended to the image data.

Category.Name: ChunkDataControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.

Category.Name: AutoFunctionsROI
Category.Description: Allows limiting the region of interest for auto functions (Auto Exposure, Auto Gain, Auto White Balance).

Category.Name: ActionControl
Category.Description: The Action chapter describes all features related to Action Signals in the device.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.Description: Contains the features related to image acquisition, including the triggering mode.

Integer.Name: GPOut
Integer.Description: Status of the digital output pin.

Integer.Name: GPIn
Integer.Description: Status of the digital input pin.

Integer.Name: ExposureAutoReference
Integer.Description: Configures the target image brightness of the ExposureAuto/GainAuto algorithm.

Integer.Name: ChunkIMX174FrameId
Integer.Description: IMX174 double exposure frame id.

Integer.Name: ChunkIMX174FrameSet
Integer.Description: IMX174 double exposure frame set identifier.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionsROIHeight
Integer.Description: Vertical size of the auto functions region of interest.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionsROIWidth
Integer.Description: Horizontal size of the auto functions region of interest.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionsROITop
Integer.Description: Vertical offset of the auto functions region of interest.

Integer.Name: AutoFunctionsROILeft
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset of the auto functions region of interest.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupMask
Integer.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupKey
Integer.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Integer.Name: ActionSelector
Integer.Description: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.

Integer.Name: ActionDeviceKey
Integer.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands. The device internal assertion of an action signal is only authorized if the ActionDeviceKey and the action device key value in the protocol message are equal.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software or Any.

Command.Name: PixelFixSaveData
Command.Description: Stores the camera's hot pixel array to persistant memory.

Command.Name: PixelFixApplyData
Command.Description: Applies the camera's current hot pixel array to the image stream.

Command.Name: PixelFixClearData
Command.Description: Initializes the camera's hot pixel array with default values.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

EnumEntry.Name: Action0
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the Action0 command will be used as internal source for the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the exposure of one frame.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control mode.

Enumeration.Name: AutoFunctionsROIPreset
Enumeration.Description: Select a predefined region of interest for auto functions.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Category.Name: GigEVision
Category.Description: Category that contains the features pertaining to the GigE Vision transport layer of the device.

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.Description: Returns the scan type of the sensor of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.Description: Device's serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.Description: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTLType
Enumeration.Description: Transport Layer type of the device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: DeviceTLVersionMajor
MaskedIntReg.Description: Major version of the Transport Layer of the device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: DeviceTLVersionMinor
MaskedIntReg.Description: Minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionSubMinor
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSelector
Integer.Description: Selects which Link of the device to control.

Float.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatTimeout
Float.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelSelector
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceStreamChannelType
Enumeration.Description: Reports the type of the stream channel.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelLink
Integer.Description: Index of device`s Link to use for streaming the specifed stream channel.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceStreamChannelEndianness
Enumeration.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

EnumEntry.Name: Little
EnumEntry.Description: Stream channel data is little Endian.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel.

Integer.Name: DeviceEventChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of event channels supported by the device.

Boolean.Name: PixelFixEnable
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera's hot pixel correction.

Boolean.Name: ExposureAutoUpperLimitAuto
Boolean.Description: Automatically sets the upper limit to match the Acquisition Frame Rate.

Boolean.Name: ExposureAutoHighlighReduction
Boolean.Description: Lets the ExposureAuto/GainAuto algorithm try to avoid over-exposures.

Boolean.Name: IMX174HardwareWDREnable
Boolean.Description: Enable IMX174 WDR mode. This mode enables setting a second, longer exposure time (IMX174 WDR Shutter 2), which is used for every other frame.

Boolean.Name: ChunkModeActive
Boolean.Description: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Boolean.Name: AutoFunctionsROIEnable
Boolean.Description: Enable the region of interest for auto functions.

Boolean.Name: PixelFixDebug
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera's hot pixel correction debug mode (show hot pixels).

Register.Name: ChunkImage
Register.Description: Returns the entire image data included in the payload.

Float.Name: TriggerDenoise
Float.Description: Specifies the time for which trigger input has to be high in order to be accepted as a trigger signal.

Float.Name: TriggerMask
Float.Description: Specifies the time for which trigger pulses are ignored after accepting a trigger signal.

Float.Name: TriggerDebouncer
Float.Description: Specifies the time for which trigger input has to be low in order accept the next trigger signal.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.Description: Specifies the delay to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoUpperLimit
Float.Description: Upper limit of the ExposureAuto function.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoLowerLimit
Float.Description: Lower limit of the ExposureAuto function.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Float.Name: GainAutoUpperLimit
Float.Description: Upper limit of the GainAuto function.

Float.Name: GainAutoLowerLimit
Float.Description: Lower limit of the GainAuto function.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.Description: Controls the gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to he video signal.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal

Float.Name: IMX174WDRShutter2
Float.Description: Exposure time that is used for every other frame, if IMX174 WDR mode is enabled.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate at which the frames are captured.
